text: The 1986 WUKO World Karate Championships are the 8th edition of the World Karate Championships, and were held in Sydney, Australia from November 21 to November 25, 1986. ==Medalists== ===Men=== {| |- |Individual kata | | | |- |Team kata | | | |- |rowspan=2|Kumite −60 kg |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|Kumite −65 kg |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|Kumite −70 kg |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|Kumite −75 kg |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|Kumite −80 kg |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|Kumite +80 kg |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|Kumite open |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|Team kumite |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |} ===Women=== {| |- |Individual kata | | | |- |Team kata | | | |- |rowspan=2|Kumite −53 kg |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|Kumite −60 kg |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|Kumite +60 kg |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |} ==Medal table== ==References== ==External links== * World Karate Federation * Results * Report World Championships World Karate Championships Category:World Karate Championships Category:International sports competitions hosted by Australia Karate Championships Category:1980s in Sydney Category:Karate competitions in Australia
title: 1986 World Karate Championships
